Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: 'You really need to reflect on your last mission, Karenina.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Karenina', 3: "Why? Didn't we take care of the new variant? Are the Gray Ravens alright?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: 'Only because the commandant acted accordingly and the Gray Ravens have enough experience under their belt.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Since when did you like hearing yourself talk so much, Bianca?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Just the person I need. Ask the commandant yourself. Didn't headquarters approve of our results last mission?", 4: '2'}
{2: "I can't say I approve of it either.", 3: '13', 4: "Regardless, the same can't be done next time.", 5: '13'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Then what, just watch the new variant run away?! That'd be an even bigger loss!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: 'Same for Lucia, you, and the commandant...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "I did what I had to complete the mission. Now I'm taking all the blame even though it was a success.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "That's because what you did was too dangerous. We can use all sorts of other methods to track down the new variant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bianca', 3: "Not just throw yourself into harm's way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Karenina', 3: "Enough already! I don't want to talk about this anymore.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1001', 2: 'Karenina...', 3: '29', 4: 'Maybe we were a bit too harsh...', 5: '30'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bianca', 3: "It's necessary, Commandant. Karenina's more than meets the eye.", 4: '1'}
